fields.name: schemaVersion
fields.doc: GEP IT Product AVRO schema version

fields.name: itProductClass
fields.doc: type of IT Product

fields.name: itProductSubType
fields.doc: the sub-type of the IT Product

fields.name: lastUpdateTimestamp
fields.doc: timestamp in ms, UTC time

fields.name: name
fields.doc: IT Product long name

fields.name: acronym
fields.doc: IT Product short name as an 3-4 letters acronym

fields.name: code
fields.doc: the ACE IT Product (f.k.a. purpose) code

fields.name: uuid
fields.doc: unique technical ID of the IT Product

fields.name: aliases
fields.doc: an array of legacy aliases IT Product ID's

fields.name: parentItProductCode
fields.doc: Parent IT Product Code reference

fields.name: designDependencies
dependencyName
fields.doc: name of the dependency

fields.name: uuid
fields.doc: unique identifier of the dependency

fields.name: sourceItProductCode
fields.doc: IT Product Code of the source - actually this IT PRODUCT

fields.name: destinationIProductCode
fields.doc: IT Product code of the destinationIProductCode
collection of dependencies records to IT Product

fields.name: tribe
fields.doc: The Tribe owning the IT Product as a reference to a ACE Team object

fields.name: team
fields.doc: the Team owning the IT Product as a reference to a ACE Team object

fields.name: assetOwner
fields.doc: the employee who is the asset owner of the IT Product

fields.name: itCustodian
fields.doc: the employee who is the IT Custodian of the IT Product

fields.name: architect
fields.doc: the employee who is the architect of the IT Product

fields.name: productOwner
fields.doc: the employee who is the productOwner of the IT Product - inherited from the Team field

fields.name: contactPerson
fields.doc: the employee who is the main contact for the IT Product - is a member of the ACE Team owning the IT Product

fields.name: teamCostCenter
fields.doc: the cost center associated to the ACE Team owning the IT Product - inherited from the team field

fields.name: architectureCapabilities
fields.doc: a collection of architecture capabilities the IT Product maps

fields.name: developmentType
fields.doc: the main type of development of the IT Product

fields.name: runTimeTarget
fields.doc: the type of run time target

fields.name: itProductScope
fields.doc: the scope of the IT PRODUCT

fields.name: architectureStatus
fields.doc: the architecture status of the IT Product
